title: I Want To Know More
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Mari, tell me more about when you guys became the committee of the School Idol Festival.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hmm, let’s see.... How about the time when we made the slogan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Uwaaah! That sounds cool! Tell me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, leave it to me♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>So that’s how you guys came up with it.... Lanzhu learned one more thing about everyone today. Tell me something about Aqours next!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Eh? About us?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Yeah. Lanzhu wants to know about all the various school idols. Lanzhu was only crazy about Nijigaku at first, but now Lanzhu is all over every school idol!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>About Aqours, huh.... It’ll be a long story, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Uwaaaaaah! Then let’s do a sleepover! You can stay in my room, Mari!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
